parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Triggers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the text label attached to the trigger object. This is used for example as a radio slot label for radio activated triggers.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> trigger '''setTriggerText''' text

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> trigger: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>trigger [[setTriggerText]] "Call for support";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[triggerText]], [[createTrigger]], [[setTriggerActivation]], [[setTriggerArea]], [[setTriggerStatements]], [[setTriggerTimeout]], [[setTriggerType]], [[triggerInterval]], [[setTriggerInterval]], [[enableSimulation]], [[simulationEnabled]]
</value></part></template>
